hero_intro: Your gift powers education, clean water, mobile clinics, and training for local providers. Thank you for helping communities shine.

tiles.text: Health class supplies for one participant.
Subsidized Ecofiltro and training for a household.
Midwife training materials for a cohort.
Support a one‑day mobile clinic in a rural community.
Fuel, meds, and staffing for multiple jornadas.

tiles.title: Any amount
tiles.text: Strengthens local care and keeps programs running.
